name: Ricoderek Anderson
description: I’m romantic/optimistic, considerate, outgoing person, warm in nature and very creative. I like to say what I feel and what I think…I don’t like to keep my opinion just in my mind…I do like to speak about everything. I’m intellectual, emotional, confident person and I have a sense of humor, I like to laugh and have fun. I like to spend time at the gym, swim/sunbathe, hike, tennis…wine tasting, fine dining, shopping, traveling, spa…I like to play pool and dancing. I like to cook and enjoy great company with excellent wine. I like to enjoy life like it’s only once but always have plans beforehand. I am an honest, VERY loyal person, who believes in integrity.I have a daughter and she means the world to me, I want to find that special man that i will love for ever, I want him to be the best thing that will ever happen to me
